CrowdStrike IT outage: Kiwi mum pleads for Air New Zealand’s help after US flight delays strand family https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crowdstrike-it-outage-kiwi-mum-pleads-for-air-new-zeallands-help-after-us-flight-delays-strand-family/MFMOK2ENGVGBLC6T2P3DFZTYIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crowdstrike-it-outage-kiwi-mum-pleads-for-air-new-zeallands-help-after-us-flight-delays-strand-family/MFMOK2ENGVGBLC6T2P3DFZTYIE/ Cherie Howie“All the communication is, ‘Go to the app, give them a call’, but it leads nowhere”. Sat, 20 Jul 2024 07:41:17 +0000 Dunedin mum Katherine Jones and her two children are stranded in the busy and 'chaotic' George Bush Intercontinental Airport in Houston, Texas after missing their Air New Zealand flight to Auckland. The family were late after their United flight was delayed by the CrowdStrike-sparked global IT outage.
